analyzed: de'i phyir gal te de'i tshig gis sam de'i nye dus mgron du bos pa ma yin na'o zhes bya ba smras te /

original: spyir btang ba bstan nas dmigs kyis bsal ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: spyir btang ba bstan nas dmigs kyis bsal ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Having taught the general rule, in order to teach the exceptions,

analyzed: sko sham @10a * //

analyzed: la zhugs pa sngar bstan pa las 'di gnyis 'bri bar bya'o // byug ris ston pa zhes bya ba ni da 'dir brims shing //

analyzed: de'i 'og tu 'dir brims shig ces bya ba la sogs pas gral rim bzhin du mdun gyi byug ris ston par byed pa'o //

analyzed: ma byin pa la sbyin du 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: ci mgron du bos pa gang yang rung bas gang yang rung ba zos pa la 'am zhe na de'i phyir rigs kyi 'o zhes bya ba smras te /

translated: If the food is prepared by all the members of one‚Äôs own class who have gathered in a temple or monastery, or if it is prepared by those appointed by them, it is to be understood as the food of one‚Äôs own class.

analyzed: de'i phyir khyim du zhes ma smos so //

analyzed: // / da 'di man chad ni gnod par 'gyur ba'i sgo sbang ba'i ltung byed gsum bshad par bya ste /

analyzed: skyes pas gnod par 'gyur ba'i sgo spang pa'i phyir bslab pa'i gzhi gsum bcas pa'i phyir ro // de la gang la khyim gzhan du mtshan mo nyal ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: Three bases of training were formulated in order to abandon the doors for the arising of harm by men.üîΩIn regard to that, if it is asked in regard to what does the downfall exist of sleeping in the house of a layperson at night, then in response it is said:

analyzed: khyim bdag la ma dris par khyim gzhan du mtshan mo 'da' bar byed pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te / khyim bdag la ma dris par rtsig pa la sogs pas bskor ba'am /
translated: Sleeping at night in the house of a layperson without asking the householder.üîΩSleeping at night in the house of a layperson without asking the householder, in a place surrounded by walls,

original: phyugs lhas sam 'dron khang la sogs pa la khyim gzhan du mtshan mo nyal zhing 'da' bar byed pa la kha na ma tho ba 'dir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyugs lhas sam 'dron khang la sogs pa la khyim gzhan du mtshan mo nyal zhing 'da' bar byed pa la kha na ma tho ba 'dir 'gyur ro //
translated: in a cow pen, in a granary, and so on, is a downfall in this system.

original: bud med la rag las pa nyid yin na de la dris na ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni khyim gang na bud med dbang che zhing khyim bdag gis bud med kyi tshig las 'da' bar mi nus pa de ni bud med la rag las pa nyidüîΩces bya ste /
analyzed: bud med la rag las pa nyid yin na de la dris na ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni khyim gang na bud med dbang che zhing khyim bdag gis bud med kyi tshig las 'da' bar mi nus pa de ni bud med la rag las pa nyid ces bya ste /
translated: A house where a woman is powerful and the householder cannot transgress the word of the woman is called dependent on a woman.

original: der ni bud med la dris na khyim bdag la ma dris par mtshan mo 'da' bar byed pa la ltung ba med pa'o //
analyzed: der ni bud med la dris na khyim bdag la ma dris par mtshan mo 'da' bar byed pa la ltung ba med pa'o //
translated: If one asks the woman there, there is no offense in passing the night without asking the householder.

original: gang la mtshan mo ma brtags par skyabs yod par nyal ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir /üîΩmtshan mo ma brtags par skyabs yod par 'da' bar byed pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: gang la mtshan mo ma brtags par skyabs yod par nyal ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir / mtshan mo ma brtags par skyabs yod par 'da' bar byed pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: What is the offense of sleeping in a shelter without examining it at night?

original: skyabs yod pa'i phyogs ma brtags par mtshan mo nyal zhing 'da' bar byed pa la kha na ma tho ba 'dir @46b 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyabs yod pa'i phyogs ma brtags par mtshan mo nyal zhing 'da' bar byed pa la kha na ma tho ba 'dir @46b 'gyur ro //
translated: The offense is sleeping and passing the night without examining the area of the shelter.

analyzed: skyabs yod pa zhes bya ba ni mun khung dang thibs po la sogs pa gang du zhugs na skyes pa yod par shes par mi 'gyur ba la bya'o / gang la gnas khang du dge slong ma gzhan med par mtshan mo nyal ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: A covered place is a place such as a dark or enclosed place, where one cannot be seen to be a woman.üîΩIf one asks, Where is there an offense of lying down at night in a dwelling without another fully ordained nun? the text says:

original: gnas khang du dge slong ma gzhan med par mtshan mo 'da' bar byed pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: gnas khang du dge slong ma gzhan med par mtshan mo 'da' bar byed pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /

original: mtshan mo gnas khang du dge slong ma gzhan med par gcig pu nyal zhing 'da' bar byed pa la kha na ma tho ba 'dir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan mo gnas khang du dge slong ma gzhan med par gcig pu nyal zhing 'da' bar byed pa la kha na ma tho ba 'dir 'gyur ro //
translated: This offense is incurred when one lies down alone at night in a dwelling without another fully ordained nun.

original: 'dir gtsug lag gi rjes su 'brang bas gnas khang zhes smos par zad kyi g-yogs pa'i phyogs gzhan la yang kha na ma tho ba 'dra'o //
analyzed: 'dir gtsug lag gi rjes su 'brang bas gnas khang zhes smos par zad kyi g-yogs pa'i phyogs gzhan la yang kha na ma tho ba 'dra'o //
translated: Here, the term dwelling is used in accordance with the scriptures. However, this offense is similar in other covered places.

original: bslab pa'i gzhi 'di gsum la mtshan ma'i mtha'i skad cig la ni ltung byed do //
analyzed: bslab pa'i gzhi 'di gsum la mtshan ma'i mtha'i skad cig la ni ltung byed do //
translated: In these three bases of training, there is an offense of wrongdoing for each moment until the end of the night.

original: mdun rol du ni nyes byas so //
analyzed: mdun rol du ni nyes byas so //
translated: There is an offense of wrong conduct for each moment beforehand.

original: de shi ba la sogs pa la ni ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni /üîΩdge slong ma gzhan de shi'am babs sam yul gzhan la sogs par sor ngam /
analyzed: de shi ba la sogs pa la ni ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni / dge slong ma gzhan de shi'am babs sam yul gzhan la sogs par sor ngam /
translated: There is no offense if she dies and so on.

original: rkyen gzhan gyis med par gyur na gcig pu gnas khang du mtshan mo 'da' bar byed pa la ltung ba med pa yin te des mi 'dod bzhin du bral ba bstan to //
analyzed: rkyen gzhan gyis med par gyur na gcig pu gnas khang du mtshan mo 'da' bar byed pa la ltung ba med pa yin te des mi 'dod bzhin du bral ba bstan to //
translated: If the other nun dies, goes away, goes to another country, and so on, or if she is no longer available due to other circumstances, then there is no offense for the nun to spend the night alone in the dwelling. This teaches that she is separated against her will.üîΩThe three downfalls that are doors to ruin

original: gnod par gyur pa'i sgo spang ba'i ltung byed gsum mo zhes bya ba khyam gzhan du mtshan mo nyal ba'i ltung byed dang mtshan mo ma brtags par skyabs yod par nyal ba'i ltung byed dang / gnas khang du dge slong ma gzhan med par mtshan mo nyal ba'i ltung byed gsum bshad zin to /
analyzed: gnod par gyur pa'i sgo spang ba'i ltung byed gsum mo zhes bya ba khyam gzhan du mtshan mo nyal ba'i ltung byed dang mtshan mo ma brtags par skyabs yod par nyal ba'i ltung byed dang / gnas khang du dge slong ma gzhan med par mtshan mo nyal ba'i ltung byed gsum bshad zin to /
translated: The three downfalls that are doors to ruin are the downfall of sleeping at night in the same room as a man, the downfall of sleeping at night in a protected place without examining the place, and the downfall of sleeping at night in a dwelling without another nun.

original: // / gang la longs spyod cing gnas btang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: // / gang la longs spyod cing gnas btang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: What is the downfall of abandoning the place where one is staying?

original: dge slong ma dang khri gcig la lhan cig reg pa dang bcas shing mtshan mo nyal ba la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: dge slong ma dang khri gcig la lhan cig reg pa dang bcas shing mtshan mo nyal ba la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: It is sleeping together with a nun on the same bed with physical contact at night.

original: dge slong ma dang lhan cig khri gcig gi steng du sha mthang reg pa dang / bcas shing mtshan mo nyal bar byed pa la ni kha na ma tho ba 'dir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge slong ma dang lhan cig khri gcig gi steng du sha mthang reg pa dang / bcas shing mtshan mo nyal bar byed pa la ni kha na ma tho ba 'dir 'gyur ro //

original: reg pa dang bcas shing zhes bya ba ni reg pa dang bcas bzhin du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: reg pa dang bcas shing zhes bya ba ni reg pa dang bcas bzhin du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

analyzed: de'i phyir reg pa dang bcas pa la kha na ma tho ba rdzogs par 'gyur te /

analyzed: ma reg pa la ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said that there is no offense if there is no contact.

original: de dang ngam du ma dang lhan cig kyang rung ste /
analyzed: de dang ngam du ma dang lhan cig kyang rung ste /
translated: Even if one sleeps together with a nun,

original: gtur bu la sogs pas bar du chod cing dran pa nye bar gzhag ste /
analyzed: gtur bu la sogs pas bar du chod cing dran pa nye bar gzhag ste /
translated: if there is a partition such as a screen, and one is mindful,üîΩthere is no offense.

original: @47a * // lus kyi reg pa ro myang ba med par khri mi 'gul ba tha mal pa 'am stan la ni ltung ba med do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: @47a * // lus kyi reg pa ro myang ba med par khri mi 'gul ba tha mal pa 'am stan la ni ltung ba med do zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should not lie down on a bed or on the ground without a mat, without the awareness of the body.

analyzed: de dang ngam zhes bya ba ni dge slong ma cig shos de dang lhan cig nyal ba de la'o //
translated: With that, or with another nun, means with that nun, or with another nun.

original: du ma dang lhan cig kyang rung ste zhes bya ba ni gcig pu dang lhan cig nyal ba 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad kyi gnyis la sogs pa dang lhan cig nyal yang rung ba'o //
analyzed: du ma dang lhan cig kyang rung ste zhes bya ba ni gcig pu dang lhan cig nyal ba 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad kyi gnyis la sogs pa dang lhan cig nyal yang rung ba'o //

original: ci gyi na de bzhin nyal ba la 'am zhe na de'i phyir /üîΩgtur bu la sogs pas bar du gcad cing zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: ci gyi na de bzhin nyal ba la 'am zhe na de'i phyir / gtur bu la sogs pas bar du gcad cing zhes bya ba smras te /

analyzed: chos gos gyi gtur bu dang / lhung bzed kyi snod la sogs pas mal gyi bar du bcad par byas pa de la'o //
translated: With a partition, etc., means with a partition, such as a robe or a bowl bag, between the two.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag ste zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag ste zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: ji nas kyang lus kyi reg pa'i ro myang ba med par bya ba'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la'o //

original: lus kyi reg pa'i ro myong ba med par zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lus kyi reg pa'i ro myong ba med par zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúnot experiencing the taste of physical contact‚Äù means

analyzed: gal te gtur bu la sogs pas bar du bcad zin kyang brgya la lus reg par gyur na reg pa de'i ro myang ba med par byed pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de'i 'bras bu yin no //

analyzed: de bas na rnam pa de lta bu dran pa nye bar gzhag par bya'o //

analyzed: gzhi gang la de dag dang lhan cig nyal ba la ltung ba med ce na de'i phyir khri mi 'gul ba tha mal ba zhes bya ba smras te /

original: khri tha mal pa la yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: khri tha mal pa la yang de bzhin no //

original: stan la yang de bzhin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: stan la yang de bzhin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //

original: yod na nyes byas so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yod na nyes byas so zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: mal so sor bya pa'i skabs yod na bar du bcad pa la sogs pas nyal ba la ni nyes byas kyi kha na ma tho bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: longs spyod cing gnas pa btang ba'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba de bshad zin to /

analyzed: // / da 'di man chad ni byi dor byed pa las gyur ba'i ltung byed brgyad ston te /

analyzed: de la gang la @47b dge slong ma byi dor byed du 'jug pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir /

analyzed: rang gi lus kyi dril phyis dge slong ma byed du 'jug pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /

analyzed: gang la dge slong ma byi dor byed du 'jug pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: If one asks: ‚ÄúWhat is the downfall that is due to having a nun massage one‚Äôs body?‚Äù

original: dge slong ma'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: dge slong ma'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: The answer is: ‚ÄúIt is having a nun massage one‚Äôs body.‚Äù

original: rang gi lus kyi dril phyi dge slong ma byed du 'jug pa la kha na ma tho ba 'dir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi lus kyi dril phyi dge slong ma byed du 'jug pa la kha na ma tho ba 'dir 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the downfall that is due to having a nun massage one‚Äôs body.

analyzed: gang la dge tshul ma byi dor byed du 'jug pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir /

analyzed: dge tshul ma'o zhes bya ba smras te /

analyzed: gang la bud med bkru bshal byed du 'jug pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na de'i phyir /

analyzed: gang la rdzas dri zhim pos rang gi lus skud pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na /
